column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ordered 3 different bowls for my first time
column2: just so I can taste everything. Out of the Tonkatsu Spicy
column4: and the chef's special Miso ramen
column5: the black was b y far my favorite. The broth is a rice pork base with THIN noodles
column6: which are so much better than the fat noodles. The pork is super soft and delicious
column7: not dry at all. The only complaint I have are the additions such as the egg and the bamboo shoots. The bamboo is literally straight from a can and the egg is a normal boiled egg
